Package ec

Interface Singleton

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, Setup
All Known Implementing Classes:
AMALGAMBreeder, BarChartStatistics, BaselineMEStatistics, BaselineStatistics, Best1BinDEBreeder, Breeder, ChartableStatistics, CMAESBreeder, CMAESInitializer, CompetitiveEvaluator, ConstructiveBreeder, DEBreeder, DEEvaluator, DistributedMEBreeder, DistributedMEEvolutionState, DistributedMEExchanger, DistributedMEInitializer, DistributedMEStatistics, DOVSBreeder, DOVSEvaluator, DOVSInitializer, Evaluator, EvolutionState, Exchanger, Finisher, GPInitializer, HypervolumeStatistics, Initializer, InterPopulationExchange, IslandExchange, KozaShortStatistics, MapElitesEvaluator, MonaStatistics, MuCommaLambdaBreeder, MultiObjectiveStatistics, MultiPopCoevolutionaryEvaluator, MuPlusLambdaBreeder, MyStatistics, NEATBreeder, NEATInitializer, NSGA2Breeder, NSGA3Breeder, PBILBreeder, PSOBreeder, Rand1EitherOrDEBreeder, RandomRestarts, RuleInitializer, SaveImagesStatistics, SimpleBarChartStatistics, SimpleBreeder, SimpleDistributedMEExchanger, SimpleEvaluator, SimpleEvolutionState, SimpleExchanger, SimpleFinisher, SimpleInitializer, SimpleShortStatistics, SimpleStatistics, SimpleXYSeriesChartStatistics, SingleStateBreeder, SingleStateEvolutionState, SpatialBreeder, SpatialMultiPopCoevolutionaryEvaluator, SPEA2Breeder, Statistics, SteadyStateBreeder, SteadyStateEvaluator, SteadyStateEvolutionState, TarpeianStatistics, XYSeriesChartStatistics
public interface Singleton extends Setup
A Singleton is a class for which there will be only one instance in the entire course of a run, and which will exist for pretty much the entire run. Singletons are set up using setup(...) when they are first created.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sean Luke
